book.synopsis: In this sequel to Measle and the Wrathmonk, Measle finds himself involved in yet another daring adventure, facing a new batch of Wrathmonks and standing his ground against the frightening Dragodon. Reprint.
book.dimensions: Height: 7.25 Inches, Length: 5 Inches, Weight: 0.5 Pounds, Width: 0.5 Inches
